snippet: A legend in Indian art, V. S. Gaitonde looked westward, eastward, homeward and inward to create an intensely personalized version of transculturalism.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews paintings by Vasudeo Santu Gaitonde in exhibition V S Gaitonde: Painting as Process, Painting as Life at Guggenheim Museum.
lead_paragraph: A legend in Indian art, V. S. Gaitonde looked westward, eastward, homeward and inward to create an intensely personalized version of transculturalism.

headline.seo: V. S. Gaitonde Retrospective at the Guggenheim
headline.main: An Indian Modernist With a Global Gaze
headline.print_headline: An Indian Modernist With a Global Gaze
